name: Gather (グ・Nitta-yon)
description:
Gather is a retro-style arcade game where you must must collect as many rabbits as you can. Over time, obstacles may start appearing to get in your way. Aim for a high score, and share with your friends and see who can do better! 

Credits: Nitta

Font used:
PIXELADE by Antaviana Typeface Division

Music used:
Short Retro Action Loop by Andrew Sitkov

Various sound effects from GameDev Market

Submission to Global Game Jam 2023
